Package one.microstream.storage.configuration

Interface ConfigurationParser

All Known Implementing Classes:
ConfigurationParser.IniConfigurationParser, ConfigurationParser.XmlConfigurationParser
Functional Interface:
This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.
@Deprecated
@FunctionalInterface
public interface ConfigurationParser
Deprecated.
replaced by generic ConfigurationParser, will be removed in version 8
See Also:
one.microstream.storage.configuration

      Deprecated.

      Parameters:
      configuration - the configuration to populate
      data - the input to parse
      Returns:
      the given configuration
      Throws:
      StorageConfigurationException - if an error occurs while parsing
